# wasFollowingGuidance

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the device was applying the electricity guidance at the time of the event.

## Declaration

```swift
let wasFollowingGuidance: Bool
```

## Checking the guidance state

- **init(wasFollowingGuidance:guidanceToken:)**: Initialize the GuidanceState for the [doc://com.apple.energykit/documentation/EnergyKit/ElectricHVACLoadEvent]
- **guidanceToken**: The guidance token for the guidance that you requested.

items.description: The guidance token for the guidance that you requested.
